articles.title: Iceland becomes first country in Europe to lift ALL coronavirus restrictions - Daily Mail
articles.description: Icelanders will no longer need to wear masks or keep a safe distance from other people as all COVID-19 restrictions will be lifted on Saturday, the country's health minister said on Friday.
articles.content:
Iceland will be the first country in Europe to lift all its Covid-19 restrictions as it is set to scrap face masks and social distancing, the country's health minister said today.

articles.title: UEFA rule change leaves Liverpool at a disadvantage, and Jürgen Klopp won't be happy - Liverpool.com
articles.description: The away goal rule has been axed by the European governing body after 56 years, and the resulting change will mean Liverpool and other teams in European competition face the potential of more game time.

articles.description: Two penalties from Cristiano Ronaldo helped holders Portugal squeeze into the last 16 of the European Championship after a 2-2 draw with France on Wednesday
